verses.verse: Come, Thou almighty King, Help us Thy name to sing, Help us to praise! Father all glorious, O'er all victorious, Come, and reign over us, Ancient of Days!
Come, holy Comforter, Thy sacred witness bear, In this glad hour: Thou who almighty art, Now rule in every heart, And ne'er from us depart, Spirit of power!
To Thee, great One in Thine, Eternal praises be, Hence, evermore: Thy sovereign majesty may we in glory see, And to eternity Love and adore!
